sentences.sContent: I promise I will do my duty .
sentences.sCn: 我保证会尽到我的责任。

sentences.sContent: We feel it is our duty to help her.
sentences.sCn: 我们感到帮助她是我们的责任。

sentences.sContent: Local authorities have a duty to keep the streets clean.
sentences.sCn: 地方当局有责任保持街道整洁。

sentences.sContent: You have a duty to your husband and to your children.
sentences.sCn: 你对你丈夫和孩子负有责任。

sentences.sContent: She has a strong sense of moral duty .
The unions have failed in their duty to female workers.
sentences.sCn: 工会未能对女职工尽到责任。

sentences.sContent: In the traditional Hindu family, the son is duty-bound to look after his mother.
sentences.sCn: 在传统的印度家庭里，儿子负有照顾母亲的责任。

synos.tran: 责任；[税收]关税；[管理]职务

phrases.pCn: 工作周期；占空度；忙闲度
轻型的；小功率的；温和条件下的；轻负荷
有责任（做某事）；感到应该
高关税；高性能的；重型的
玩忽职守；[法]失职；过失责任

words.tran: 应纳税的；应征税的；（输入品）应课关税的

trans.tranCn: 责任；[税收] 关税；职务
trans.tranOther: something that you have to do because it is morally or legally right
